title: Smurfs in ranked...
body: What is being done about this, and what can I do to help? There's nothing fun about someone in plat playing ranked on a bronze smurf and dumpstering everyone, why has this been allowed to continue for so long without penalty? I'm not overly salty about smurferinos but theres nothing fun about being handed a "lose-the-game-for-free" card because some guy is feeling insecure about their ability to compete at their actual level.

replies.body: Theres a difference between a smurf and a good player whos just inconsistent. Smurfs usually rank up so fast that you rarely see them. IMO
Unless they have a 70% win rate+ in low elo just assume they are not a smurf
Smurfing is fine, i bet you don't complain when you have a smurf on your team and you win XD

For me, playing on my main can be a bit of a pain in the ass if I want to practice a new champ but don't want to go into normals as people don't take it so seriously. Obviously I do not play a new champ as well as my mains so it can be be annoying being matched with people playing their mains while I try to learn.  Obviously I do not throw games to get to bronze, rather I stick around silver 1 - gold 5.

I personally do not cross many "smurfs" that play to win, most i encounter just go inting and troll games.

Honestly have no problem if they play to win, it is a god sent to cross players that know what they are doing and can manage a team and know team work.
This also help with a break in a massive loss streak which I have had for months now, I do not get any "smurfs" that play pro on my team, it always seems like my team Jerry daycare vs Citadel of Ricks! 

My wins have been due to most commonly 1 other player that has map awareness and knows limitations of enemies champions, they do not carry hard either! 

It is mostly them mid or jungle, when 2 other lanes have fed like giving an enemy 6-0 lead by 10mins into the game. 
They tend to be aware of enemy position and go for objectives, commonly they do not win by single handed wiping out the enemy team. 
They win by securing drakes, rift herald, taking towers and stealing enemy jgl camps, a more wholesome benefit to the team, helping everyone obtain gold and turning the tides of the game!

I have not so often had games where one person single handed killing my team or the enemy team like some kind of Riven casting Broken Wings through my grandmothers flower garden!

I guess, for me its not too bad kinda helps deal with the depression of constantly losing!

> [{quoted}](name=Azirious Mistake,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=yEcrjoRQ,comment-id=,timestamp=2017-10-19T07:06:37.662+0000)
>
>why has this been allowed to continue for so long without penalty?

that answer is pretty simple. smurf/alt accounts = $$$. lots of $$$.

there are plenty of greater disincentives they could put in to stop smurfing but there's still always going to be some people that will put in the effort. 

eg. they could make you link accounts to a mobile number. you would only play against people that have linked it and a mobile number can only have 1 account linked. this should greatly reduce it for the people willing to link but there still will be some individuals that will just go out and buy a sim and switch them around continuously just to make and play a smurf.

eg.2 probably the best way would be to make the requirements for ranked much higher/harder. such as needing to have played x games or x wins or x hours played in norms. again some people will put in the effort. but then true new players would complain that it takes too long (even though its prob best for them too). another problem with this is how do you deal with the current smurf accounts out there already? riot can tell if 2 accounts are the same person so theoretically they could ban these accounts or adjust them somehow but they are not going to do that.
